title: Accused Florida gunman visited restaurants, store after killing: sheriff
text:
Accused Florida gunman visited restaurants, store after killing: sheriff 4:50am IST - 03:35 
The 19-year-old man accused of killing 17 people at a Florida high school fled hidden in a crowd of frightened students and visited two fast food restaurants before he was arrested less than two hours after the massacre, officials said on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
